desc: Welcome to Catty Collins, an online clothing company created by a 6 yr old dedicated to helping save the lives of abandoned and homeless cats and dogs. With every purchase, we'll donate 10% to stopping animal homelessness. Shop to save lives #bettertogether

layout.text: You shop, we give. Catty Collins was created by a passionate 6 yr old to promote the love for cats and dogs and help save these amazing, loving animals. A portion of proceeds from every purchase supports shelter pets.
